title: Income Tax Department: ITR-AIS Mismatch Emails Are Advisory, Not Punitive
content:
# Income Tax Department: ITR-AIS Mismatch Emails Are Advisory, Not Punitive

Ek important update hai. Income Tax Department ne ITR-AIS mismatch emails ko lekar ek crucial clarification announce kiya hai.

*   **Nature of Emails:** Department ne clarify kiya hai ki recent system-generated emails aur SMS alerts regarding ITR-AIS mismatches purely advisory hain. Yeh koi penalty notice, scrutiny summons, ya enforcement action nahi hain.
*   **Objective:** In communications ka primary objective taxpayers ko facilitate karna aur unhein department ke paas available transaction information (banks aur financial institutions jaise reporting entities se mili hui) ke baare mein aware karna hai. Isse voluntary compliance ko badhawa milega.
*   **Action for Taxpayers:** Taxpayers ko advise kiya gaya hai ki woh apna Annual Information Statement (AIS) review karein aur usko apne Income Tax Return (ITR) ke saath reconcile karein.
*   **Correction Opportunity:** Agar koi discrepancy milti hai, toh taxpayers apni already filed ITR revise kar sakte hain ya belated return file kar sakte hain.
*   **Deadline:** Assessment Year 2025-26 ke liye belated ya revised return file karne ki last date December 31, 2025, hai.
*   **No Action Needed:** Agar aapki filing accurate aur complete hai, aur available information se align karti hai, toh aapko koi action lene ki zaroorat nahi hai.
